abstract: A deal for the international wealth management business of Bank of America Merrill Lynch would help the Swiss firm diversify at a time when local regulators are putting pressure on the country’s financial institutions.
snippet: A deal for the international wealth management business of Bank of America Merrill Lynch would help the Swiss firm diversify at a time when local regulators are putting pressure on the country’s financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss bank Julius Baer is in talks to acquire the international wealth management business of Bank of America Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Julius Baer in Talks to Buy Bank of America Unit
